00042 NG_NetworkScene::NG_NetworkScene(NG_NetworkDeviceInterface* nic)
00043 {
00044     m_networkdevice = nic;
00045 }

00047 NG_NetworkScene::~NG_NetworkScene()
00048 {
00049     ClearAllMessageMaps();

00055 void NG_NetworkScene::proceed(double curtime)
00056 {
00057     if (!m_networkdevice) return;
00058     if (!m_networkdevice->IsOnline()) return;
00059 
00060     ClearAllMessageMaps();
00061 
00062     // read all NetworkMessages from the device
00063     vector<NG_NetworkMessage*> messages =
00064         m_networkdevice->RetrieveNetworkMessages();
00065 
00066     vector<NG_NetworkMessage*>::iterator mesit = messages.begin();
00067     for (; !(mesit == messages.end()); mesit++) {
00068         NG_NetworkMessage* message = (*mesit);
00069         vector<NG_NetworkMessage*>* tmplist=NULL;
00070 
00071         vector<NG_NetworkMessage*>** tmplistptr =
00072             m_messagesByDestinationName[message->GetDestinationName()];
00073         // if there is already a vector of messages, append, else create
00074         // a new vector and insert into map
00075         if (!tmplistptr) {
00076             tmplist = new vector<NG_NetworkMessage*>;
00077             m_messagesByDestinationName.insert(message->GetDestinationName(),
00078                                                tmplist);
00079         } else {
00080             tmplist = *tmplistptr;
00081         }
00082         message->AddRef();
00083         tmplist->push_back(message);
00084         tmplist = NULL;
00085 
00086         tmplistptr = m_messagesBySenderName[message->GetSenderName()];
00087         // if there is already a vector of messages, append, else create
00088         // a new vector and insert into map
00089         if (!tmplistptr) {
00090             tmplist = new vector<NG_NetworkMessage*>;
00091             m_messagesBySenderName.insert(message->GetSenderName(), tmplist);
00092         }  else {
00093             tmplist = *tmplistptr;
00094         }
00095         message->AddRef();
00096         tmplist->push_back(message);
00097         tmplist = NULL;
00098         
00099         tmplistptr = m_messagesBySubject[message->GetSubject()];
00100         // if there is already a vector of messages, append, else create
00101         // a new vector and insert into map
00102         if (!tmplistptr) {
00103             tmplist = new vector<NG_NetworkMessage*>;
00104             m_messagesBySubject.insert(message->GetSubject(), tmplist);
00105         }  else {
00106             tmplist = *tmplistptr;
00107         }
00108         message->AddRef();
00109         tmplist->push_back(message);
00110         tmplist = NULL;
00111     }
00112 }

00117 void NG_NetworkScene::AddObject(NG_NetworkObject* object)
00118 {
00119     if (! m_networkdevice->IsOnline()) return;
00120 
00121     const STR_String& name = object->GetName();
00122     m_networkObjects.insert(name, object);
00123 }

00128 void NG_NetworkScene::RemoveObject(NG_NetworkObject* object)
00129 {
00130     if (! m_networkdevice->IsOnline()) return;
00131 
00132     const STR_String& name = object->GetName();
00133     m_networkObjects.remove(name);
00134 }

00139 void NG_NetworkScene::RemoveAllObjects()
00140 {
00141     m_networkObjects.clear();

00147 NG_NetworkObject* NG_NetworkScene::FindNetworkObject(const STR_String& objname)
00148 {
00149     NG_NetworkObject *nwobj = NULL;
00150     if (! m_networkdevice->IsOnline()) return nwobj;
00151 
00152     NG_NetworkObject **nwobjptr = m_networkObjects[objname];
00153     if (nwobjptr) {
00154         nwobj = *nwobjptr;
00155     }
00156 
00157     return nwobj;
00158 }

00160 bool NG_NetworkScene::ConstraintsAreValid(
00161     const STR_String& from,
00162     const STR_String& subject,
00163     NG_NetworkMessage* message)
00164 {
00165     vector<NG_NetworkMessage*>** fromlistptr =  m_messagesBySenderName[from];
00166     vector<NG_NetworkMessage*>** subjectlistptr =  m_messagesBySubject[subject];
00167 
00168     vector<NG_NetworkMessage*>* fromlist = (fromlistptr ? *fromlistptr : NULL);
00169     vector<NG_NetworkMessage*>* subjectlist = (subjectlistptr ? *subjectlistptr : NULL);
00170     
00171     return (
00172         ( from.IsEmpty()    || (!fromlist ? false    : (!(std::find(fromlist->begin(), fromlist->end(), message)       == fromlist->end())))
00173         ) &&
00174         ( subject.IsEmpty() || (!subjectlist ? false : (!(std::find(subjectlist->begin(), subjectlist->end(), message) == subjectlist->end())))
00175         ));
00176 }
00177 
00178 vector<NG_NetworkMessage*> NG_NetworkScene::FindMessages(
00179     const STR_String& to,
00180     const STR_String& from,
00181     const STR_String& subject,
00182     bool spamallowed)
00183 {
00184     vector<NG_NetworkMessage*> foundmessages;
00185     bool notfound = false;
00186 
00187     // broad phase
00188     notfound = ((to.IsEmpty() || spamallowed) ? notfound : m_messagesByDestinationName[to] == NULL);
00189     if (!notfound)
00190         notfound = (from.IsEmpty() ? notfound : m_messagesBySenderName[from] == NULL);
00191     if (!notfound)
00192         notfound = (subject.IsEmpty() ? notfound : m_messagesBySubject[subject] == NULL);
00193     if (notfound) {
00194         // it's definitely NOT in the scene, so stop looking
00195     } else { // narrow phase
00196         // possibly it's there, but maybe not (false hit)
00197         if (to.IsEmpty()) {
00198             // take all messages, and check other fields
00199             MT_assert(!"objectnames that are empty are not valid, so make it a hobby project :)\n");
00200         } else {
00201             //todo: find intersection of messages (that are in other 2 maps)
00202             vector<NG_NetworkMessage*>** tolistptr = m_messagesByDestinationName[to];
00203             if (tolistptr) {
00204                 vector<NG_NetworkMessage*>* tolist = *tolistptr;
00205                 vector<NG_NetworkMessage*>::iterator listit;
00206                 for (listit=tolist->begin();!(listit==tolist->end());listit++) {
00207                     NG_NetworkMessage* message = *listit;
00208                     if (ConstraintsAreValid(from, subject, message)) {
00209                         message->AddRef();
00210                         foundmessages.push_back(message);
00211                     }
00212                 } 
00213             }
00214             // TODO find intersection of messages (that are in other 2 maps)
00215             if (spamallowed) {
00216                 tolistptr = m_messagesByDestinationName[""];
00217                 if (tolistptr) {
00218                     vector<NG_NetworkMessage*>* tolist = *tolistptr;
00219                     vector<NG_NetworkMessage*>::iterator listit;
00220                     for (listit=tolist->begin();!(listit==tolist->end());listit++) {
00221                         NG_NetworkMessage* message = *listit;
00222                         if (ConstraintsAreValid(from, subject, message)) {
00223                             message->AddRef();
00224                             foundmessages.push_back(message);
00225                         }
00226                     } 
00227                 }
00228             }
00229         }
00230     } 
00231     return foundmessages;
00232 }

00234 void NG_NetworkScene::SendMessage(
00235     const STR_String& to,
00236     const STR_String& from,
00237     const STR_String& subject,
00238     const STR_String& message)
00239 {
00240     NG_NetworkMessage* msg = new NG_NetworkMessage(to, from, subject, message);
00241     m_networkdevice->SendNetworkMessage(msg);
00242     msg->Release();
00243 }
00244 
00245 void NG_NetworkScene::ClearAllMessageMaps(void)
00246 {
00247     ClearMessageMap(m_messagesByDestinationName);
00248     ClearMessageMap(m_messagesBySenderName);
00249     ClearMessageMap(m_messagesBySubject);
00250 }
00251 
00252 void NG_NetworkScene::ClearMessageMap(TMessageMap& map)
00253 {
00254     // Release the messages in the map
00255     for (int i = 0; i < map.size(); i++) {
00256         vector<NG_NetworkMessage*>* msglist;
00257         msglist = *(map.at(i));
00258 
00259         // Iterate through the current vector and release all it's messages
00260         vector<NG_NetworkMessage*>::iterator msgit;
00261         for (msgit = msglist->begin(); msgit != msglist->end(); msgit++) {
00262             (*msgit)->Release();
00263         }
00264 
00265         // Delete the actual vector
00266         delete (msglist);
00267     }
00268 
00269     // Empty the map
00270     map.clear();
00271 }
